reviews.review: es un juego bastante bueno la verdad, lo jugué en ps3 la primera vez, y cuando vi el ambiente, me encanto demasiado, recomiendo mucho este título a las personas que le guste la temática steampunk, muy pero muy bueno.
一言难尽，总之这绝对是一个好游戏，推荐
Simplemente una chulada de juego, no me canso de jugarlo y lo repetiría las veces que sea. ♥

So, it was the first time I played a Bioshock game, never had an experiment in this franchise.

Graphics -
A very beautiful game, sky, places, characters, you can see how much effort the developers put in it.
For the 2013 game, I can say it`s looking gorgeous.

Gameplay - 
I`m an MP FPS veteran, so for me to get enjoyed playing against bots can be sometimes boring.
But OMG it was such a fun game to R&G (Run & Gun), you have a bunch of weapons options, the fight location is never the same, you always find something you wanna try.
The one thing I didn't like is that you didn't have any inventory, you can't check your weapons upgrades, you can't change the clothes you find and you can't change them until you find a new one.

Stroy - 
I'm telling you after you finished this game you will need to go and take a walk.
Maybe it's me, or it's supposed to be like it but there were a-holes in the story for me.
Without any spoilers:
Who are those brothers and sisters that help you?
How the hell he gets the support and money to build a city like it?
How they invent those bottles that give you superhero power?
And on and on... So how you can guess, this walk I machined above will take you an hour or 2, maybe 3 even.
Don't get me wrong, I loved the story and the holes in it because you go to search about it, you want to understand and solve this puzzle.

Elizabeth - 
Oh boy, her eyes...
She is full of personality, you get to know her when she happy, sad, angry, upset. And the funny thing is you start to feel the same as she is.
She does stupid things (like a human being) and clever things too. She knows how to help you in a fight at the right moment.
They nailed it with her, she takes such a huge role in this game and you will enjoy her being with you.

9 \ 10
现今当之无愧的第九艺术。

I played this game a few years ago at a friends house, didn't really click. Then one day nostalgia hits me and i went all reminiscent about System Shock 2 from back in the day. That let me down a rabbit hole and i bought this game on a special. Boy... i can't give you an accurate review of this game, if i say anything, there will be spoilers. For me this was a very good story, so many things that i did not expect. I followed the characters through their adventure. Wanted to strangle Elizabeth a few times i might add :). Lately i have started leaning towards games with a story line rather than the action packed run and gun "run of the mill" type games that i have enjoyed all these years. If you like a good story then this is for you.

Oyunu az önce bitirdim ve aldığı puanı fazlasıyla hakediyor atmosferi hikayesi oynanışı müthiş ingilizceniz yok ise biraz sıkıntı olabilir ama eğer internette yaması falan var ise alın kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum mükemmel bir oyun son 30-45 dakikası bir oyuna bedel
Oyunun hikayesinin bu kadar derin ve değişik olduğunu hayal etmemiştim hiçbir zaman. Çok güzel oyun ve uzunluğu da tatmin eder seviyesinde

Tıpkı kült olmuş filmler gibi asla eskimeyecek ve yıllar içinde dönüp yeniden tecrübe edilmek istenilecek bir harika. Kendine özgü tarzı, hala şahane görünen grafikleri, akıcı oyun mekanikleri, beyin yakan hikayesi ve Elizabeth'i için oynanmalı.
The story is wonderful.

I recommend this game

Personally I think Bioshock 2 is better. The story is really convoluted because it relies to heavily on space time and parallel universes. Gameplay is also limited compared to the previous two games such as only being able to carry two weapons, not having multiple endings and lack of choice throughout the game, some vigors are less interesting versions of plasmids etc. The story in the DLC is a little better because it ties Columbia with Rapture, it was also nice to see characters from the first 2 games and also to see the fall of Rapture. 

Stellar performances from Troy Baker and Courtnee Draper

It isn't as good as the first nor the second game, but its still a good time overall. 

The story is the weakest part of this game, by having a narrative that is all over the place, and, quite frankly, an ending that was just made for pure shock factor. When I reached it, my reaction was: "this can't be the ending." Unlike, the first and the second game that both made me cry on my first completion (got on both the good ending). Gameplay wise, is an "take your own approach" type of shooter, and all of the "vigors" are satisfying and really useful in combat, the guns are a mix bag, the machine gun being my most used weapon next to the Carbine and the Volley Launcher. The enemies are okay, they didn't poss a real threat through most of the game, because of how broken the shield is, and how you can basically toy with them with all of the vigors. This games versions of the "big daddy" enemy, the patriots, are laughably easy to take care off, unlike their rapture counterparts, and the game suffers for not having a varied enemy rooster, because most fights can be tackled with the same strategies, unlike the first (and to a lesser extent the second) where you changed tactics constantly depending on what enemy type you were dealing with. 

Graphically, this is the best looking game in the series without a doubt, unlike the second game that felt like an upgrade and a downgrade graphically, this game truly perfected the look of Bioshock. The ost is great, but it isn't as memorable as the first game's soundtrack, its better than the second game's though. Overall, I think the game (the main campaign, this doesn't rate the DLC) is an 9/10. The weakest in the series, but its still an overall great time.

I liked this game. The game world is very pretty and stylized. The story is pretty rad. I can't say much as to not spoil anything, it's better experienced blind. Much like most things. Anyway, the combat is bitchin'. The guns all feel pretty good, the abilities are sweet. There's some enemy variety here, not a ton, but enough to keep it interesting. I'd venture to say that you could play through this game a couple times and notice some cool details you may not have noticed the first time. I would recommend this to anyone enjoys "cerebral" shows or movies. That's a good thing.

In my honest opinion, Bioshock Infinite excels at immersing the player in the story. The stories for solo campaign games are often conveyed over radio and cutscenes that take you out of the game. Bioshock Infinite does a good job at telling much of the story through characters or events that are taking place right in front of you. The game does have cutscenes, but they don't break the gameplay like in most games. Instead, the camera will restrict your focus to the area of importance until the cutscene is over. Even the tutorial is immersive: set up as a carnival with different booths that with familiarize you with different game mechanics.

I thoroughly enjoyed the story of Bioshock Infinite. The world aesthetic and graphics make this one of the most visually stunning games I have played. I often felt compelled to thoroughly explore maps so that I could fully appreciate the breathtaking scenery. I found the gameplay to be quite fun (not as good as modern first-person shooters, but not boring by any means). The gameplay mechanics (weapons & abilities) felt noticeably better than the original Bioshock game. The skyhook also adds a fun aspect to gameplay that is still unique in the first-person-shooter realm.

Overall I rated the original Bioshock as a great game, but I would rate Bioshock Infinite as infinitely better.

I know there's many comments concerning how the developers didn't exactly deliver what players were wanting but given I was walking in with no expectations for this game and that I was already hyped up from the past two games, I'm glad to say that I immensely enjoyed this game. The combat is very fun and creative with the vigors opening up a whole plethora of new ways to approach combat. The story is beautiful and very engaging, it left with a sense of wanting more at the end left me emotionally moved. Although I would've appreciated some more decision making options, similar to the one in the beginning, I don't believe that should take away from the greatness of this game. I would highly recommend for anyone who's played the series before. The Bioshock games are some of my favorites and this game is definitely one you don't want to miss.
A magnificent game (applies to DLCs too). The plot is absolutely wonderful, I literally had my mouth open during the ending. The story and presentation are very moving.

Wow - this game is perhaps the greatest game sequel of all time. They took the original game and everything that made it great, and rather than rehashing or directly continuing the plot, they made everything new. Your protagonist here isn't silent any more, and he has a sidekick on top of it that gives an already-great franchise real personality.

Get this one. It's even worth it at full price. It's worth playing and re-playing. This is as good as it gets, at least in the shooter genre. It you haven't ever played this one, buckle up - you're going to enjoy the ride.

[h1] 个人主观评分：7 / 10 [/h1]

    刚开始来到天空之城确实眼前一亮，演出部分很不错，艺术设计也相当惊艳，我还截了不少图。当拿到第一个摄魂异能操控机器开门的时候我还满怀期待，也许技能方面会和游玩部分有很多有趣的交互，可惜的是制作组并没有在这方面深挖。获得越来越多的异能却不能保持玩家的新鲜感，给人的感觉就是可有可无，大部分时候根本就不需要这些看起来五花八门的异能。普通难度下各种类型的枪械也基本不存在取舍关系，对战斗影响甚微。而花金币在贩卖机购买的异能、枪械升级也比较鸡肋，给人的感觉就是毫无意义的堆砌，没有经过精心设计。操作、射击手感更是无力吐槽了，加上枯燥重复的战斗流程，以及中期混乱的游戏节奏，game play部分只能用“糟糕”来形容。

我开了两次档玩到后面始终是坚持不下去，这毕竟是一款FPS游戏，不是galgame、不是互动式电影游戏。即使剧情再优秀，但在结局悬念揭晓前要经历的是数小时的煎熬，呈直线下降的游戏体验已经让我的热情消耗殆尽，估计也不会再第三次打开这款游戏了，所以结论是至少对于我来说，《生化奇兵：无限》不是一款合格的作品。
射击手感扎实，特效也挺棒的，画面风格由于哥伦比亚的设定别具一格。玩了十个小时一周目，依然没有懂，觉得细节太多很难一次性消化完。最后游戏里某些场景有简体中文，游戏没有简体字幕，可真是妙啊。。。

Having beaten this game, and all of the DLC, I can strongly say that this is among the best written game series that I have ever played. 
The characters are well developed, the score very well done and placed, the dialog very well written, and the ending exceedingly perfect. 
You are missing out on a lot of the story, if you do not play the two Burial at Sea additions.

I did feel a bit at odds with the ending, despite it being very well done from its own individual point, but having playing Burial at Sea 1 and 2, I can now say the writers of this game, and the additional content, are simply amazing. 

10/10
best first person shooter, however, buy the DLC when its on sale :l

Lo único que puedo decir de este juego es que es maravilloso. No se ni por donde empezar. 

A pesar que nunca he jugado a la primera entrega, no me importa, voy a dar mi opinión.

Historia: La historia de este juego yo creo que es lo fundamental, es muy emocional, interesante y es una locura, te metes completamente en el personaje principal y también los personajes secundarios están creados de una forma que incluso empatizas con ellos y sabes toda su historia (incluyendo a los personajes malos) pero sobretodo si prestas muchas atención a las grabaciones que encuentras en la aventura.

AMBIENTACIÓN: La ambientación es un poco extraña, que tiene una combinación y un toque de la religión y la historia de Estados Unidos combinado con una ciudad flotante, pero aun así es una maravilla.

JUGABILIDAD: El juego es un genero de disparos en primera persona, tal vez haya gente que piense que no es muy original, pero yo habido jugado a tantos juegos de este genero este me ha encantado, la satisfacción que tienes al matar a un enemigo (un poco psicópata pero bueno) la variación de armas son las justas y necesarias tienes: Un lanza granadas, un lanza cohetes, un fusil de francotirador, una pistola pequeña, un fusil de asalto, un subfusil, una ametralladora ligera, una escopeta etc y todo estas armas con un diseño único. Además de una especie de gancho que tienes para moverte y los poderes son brutales, todos con un diseño original y cada uno sirve para hacer cosas completamente diferentes. Por cierto, no se si es que soy el puto amo (que ojala) pero el francotirador de este juego esta chetadísimo.

En conclusión que para mí unos de los mejores juegos que he jugado en mi vida y si lo hubiera jugado en 2013 cuando salió, estoy seguro que me hubiera encantado mas. Recomendado por el preció que sea, es una obra maestra y estoy seguro que no te defraudara. Le doy un 11/10

[h1]BioShock Infinite [/h1]
Достаточно неожиданно было предположить что студия Irrational Games после мрачной первой части сделают настолько яркую и запоминающуюся 2 часть.Сюжет основан на том что в мире существует очень много параллельных миров,в которых люди переживают разные событие.Саундтрек в игре шикарный,в стиле 30-40 годов.Очень драйвовый геймплей.Проработка города на высоте.Интересная фишка с энергетиками которые в игре выполняют роль сверхспособностей.
Вывод:Очень затягивающая и драйвовая игра с замечательной музыкой и сюжет по которому можно снимать фильмы.
O jogo é o mais perto do perfeito possível, apenas porque nada é perfeito...
Una obra de arte de inicio a final, a pesar de ser una historia con progreso lineal hay muchisimos detalles y lugares por explorar en tu camino a finalizar el juego.

A good game with a great visual aesthetic, story and music. Gunplay and abilities are fun, allowing for experimentation.

8/10 Buy
